ygData.subject: oops..
ygData.msgSnippet: the lenya quest seems to have been removed. i ll give you two guesses, and they are probably both right :) i screwed up about the MM quest hehe.. it DOES work.
ygData.messageBody:
the lenya quest seems to have been removed. i'll give you two guesses, and
they are probably both right :)

i screwed up about the MM quest hehe.. it DOES work. you just have to say
the exact right thing to the npc: "how do i get shadow knight armor". sounds
obvious maybe, but you shoulda been there with us when we were fielding
questions..

i still feel the frequent death of the thing and its 6+ hour respawn time
are legitimate gripes. otherwise, once you get the shopping list for items,
these quests are practically handed to us compared to the other class armor
quests.

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
